00001 <?php
00002 /* SVN FILE: $Id: FormControl.php 208 2009-02-25 16:04:11Z david@ramaboo.com $ */
00003 /**
00004  * @brief HTML form control class.
00005  * 
00006  * This class is used to to manipulate HTML form controls. It is extened by Boo_Html_Input, Boo_Html_Select, and Boo_Html_Textarea.
00007  * 
00008  * @class       Boo_Html_FormControl
00009  * @license     http://www.gnu.org/licenses/gpl-3.0.txt GNU General Public License
00010  * @link        http://code.ramaboo.com/ Boo Framework
00011  * @copyright   2009 David Singer
00012  * @author      David Singer <david@ramaboo.com>
00013  * @version     2.0.1
00014  */
00015 
00016 abstract class Boo_Html_FormControl extends Boo_Html {
00017     
00018     /**
00019      * @brief Controls stickiness.
00020      */
00021     protected $sticky = true;
00022     
00023     /**
00024      * @brief Default constructor.
00025      * @param string $element The HTML element to create.
00026      * @return void.
00027      */
00028     public function __construct($element) {
00029         parent::__construct($element);
00030     }
00031     
00032     /**
00033      * @brief Sets the inputs stickiness.
00034      * @param bool $opt If input is sticky or not.
00035      * @return bool Function always returns TRUE.
00036      */
00037     public function setSticky($opt) {
00038         $opt = (bool) $opt;
00039         $this->sticky = $opt;
00040         return true;
00041     }
00042     
00043     /**
00044      * @brief Returns inputs stickiness.
00045      * 
00046      * @return bool Returns TRUE if input is sticky, FALSE otherwise.
00047      */
00048     public function isSticky() { return $this->sticky; }
00049     
00050     /**
00051      * @brief Returns posted value.
00052      * 
00053      * @return mixed Returns the posted value if set, FALSE otherwise.
00054      */
00055     public function getPostedValue() {
00056         $value = '';
00057         
00058         $name = $this->getAttr('name');
00059         
00060         // check to make sure the name attribute is set
00061         if (!$this->hasAttr('name')) {
00062             trigger_error('Attribute name is required', E_USER_WARNING);
00063             return false;
00064         }
00065         
00066         if (array_key_exists($name, $_POST)) {
00067             $value = $_POST[$name];
00068             return $value;
00069         } else {
00070             return false;
00071         }
00072     }
00073 }
